sys_script_include.name: Dynamic Branch Filtering

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_41775acdff34e2106a5affffffffffda
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>sn_bloodbanker.Dynamic Branch Filtering</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>Dynamic Branch Filtering</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var getMyBranchRequests = Class.create();
getMyBranchRequests.prototype = {
  initialize: function() {},

  process: function() {
    var userGR = new GlideRecord('sn_bloodbanker_user');
    userGR.addQuery('user_id', gs.getUserID());
    userGR.query();

    if (userGR.next()) {
      return userGR.getValue('branch_id');
    }

    return '';
  }
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-04-07 17:13:33</sys_created_on><sys_id>41775acdff34e2106a5affffffffffda</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Dynamic Branch Filtering</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BloodBanker" source="sn_bloodbanker">0cf29c7aff2022106a5affffffffff0c</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="BloodBanker">0cf29c7aff2022106a5affffffffff0c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_41775acdff34e2106a5affffffffffda</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-04-07 18:51:28</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
